text: The 1961/62 NTFL season was the 41st season of the Northern Territory Football League (NTFL). St Marys have won there 5th premiership title while defeating the Buffaloes in the grand final by 16 points. ==Grand Final== {| class="wikitable" style="text-align:left;" |- style="background:#efefef;" ! Premiers ! GF Score ! Runner-up |- | St. Marys | 10.12 (72) - 8.8 (56) | Buffaloes (Darwin) |} == References == Category:Northern Territory Football League seasons NTFL
title: 1961/62 NTFL season
